page.title: 20The work of our Curate.
page.content: We asked our Curate to come to school and tell us about his life in the village.He leads a very busy life and has little spare time.He told us that the work of a priest is about God and People.His life is broken down into three areas:- 1.{Worshipping God}- which involves services,prayers,baptisms,weddings and funerals. 2.{Working with people}- attending schools,sport and social clubs, helping the sick and listening to people's problems. 3.{Administration and Study}- writing sermons,attending parochial and church meetings,answering letters, going on training courses and read- ing theological books. Christmas and Easter are very busy for him with extra services but August is quieter as people go away on holiday.
